EmailTemplate.description: Subject: 5 questions to ask about ATM as a Service Subject B: Would ATM as a Service work for you? https://www.ncr.com/blogs/banking/would-atm-as-a-service-work-for-me
EmailTemplate.name: 07-06-22 BNK ATMaaS Email 4.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: 5 questions to ask about ATM as a Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly: With NCR’s ATM as a Service, we run all aspects of the self-service channel, so you can concentrate on what’s important – your customers. Key benefits typically include the following: 1. Simpler day-to-day operations 2. Reduce capital spend and more predictable budgeting 3. Better customer experiences 4. More responsive to changing business needs 5. Improved compliance and security Read our blog and learn how ATM as a Service will help you achieve it all. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
